meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6782.

td.p: Myfanwy Davies, a retired china shop manager and volunteer from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
Padraic Connelly, an actor from Chicago, Illinois
Arthur Chu, a compliance analyst and voiceover artist from Broadview Heights, Ohio (whose 5-day cash winnings total $123,600)

tr.td: STARTS WITH A MUSICAL INSTRUMENT
WOLF POTPOURRI
U.N. COUNTRY ABBREVIATIONS
LADIES WHO LUNGE
OUT IN THE BACKYARD
(Jimmy: From the Petersen Automotive Museum--vehicles that have quite a story to tell.)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
